product_name: Cannondale Quick Bike Jersey - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Crank out the miles and keep cool in the men's Cannondale Quick bike jersey. It uses moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric to keep you drier and more comfortable during any ride. Quick-drying recycled polyester fabric wicks away moisture to keep you cool, and fabric shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays with a UPF rating of 50+. 6.5 in. front zipper ventilates instantly, and single zippered rear pocket keeps ride essentials at the ready. The men's Cannondale Quick bike jersey offers a relaxed fit. Closeout.
short_description: Crank out the miles and keep cool in the men's Cannondale Quick bike jersey. It uses moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric to keep you drier and more comfortable during any ride.
